alluxio.shell.command

Class CommandUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • alluxio.shell.command.CommandUtils

  • @ThreadSafe
public final class CommandUtils
extends Object
    Common util methods for executing commands.

    • Method Detail

      • setTtl

        public static void setTtl(FileSystem fs,
                          AlluxioURI path,
                          long ttlMs)
                   throws AlluxioException,
                          IOException
        Sets a new TTL value or unsets an existing TTL value for file at path.
        Parameters:
        fs - the file system for Alluxio
        path - the file path
        ttlMs - the TTL (time to live) value to use; it identifies duration (in milliseconds) the created file should be kept around before it is automatically deleted, irrespective of whether the file is pinned; Constants.NO_TTL means to unset the TTL value
        Throws:
        AlluxioException - when an Alluxio exception occurs
        IOException - when a non-Alluxio exception occurs

      • convertMsToDate

        public static String convertMsToDate(long millis)
        Converts a millisecond number to a formatted date String.
        Parameters:
        millis - a long millisecond number
        Returns:
        formatted date String

      • setPinned

        public static void setPinned(FileSystem fs,
                             AlluxioURI path,
                             boolean pinned)
                      throws AlluxioException,
                             IOException
        Sets pin state for the input path.
        Parameters:
        fs - The FileSystem client
        path - The AlluxioURI path as the input of the command
        pinned - the state to be set
        Throws:
        AlluxioException - when an Alluxio exception occurs
        IOException - when a non-Alluxio exception occurs
